Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: There to my heart was the blood applied;

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Down at the cross where my Savior died,
Down where for cleansing from sin I cried,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: There to my heart was the blood applied;

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I am so wondrously saved from sin,
Jesus so sweetly abides within,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: There at the cross where He took me in;

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Oh, precious fountain that saves from sin,
I am so glad I have entered in;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: There Jesus saves me and keeps me clean;
